articles.description: After 31 years the voice of the African-American doctor on The Simpsons will not be that of the white actor who also portrays white characters in the show.Harry Shearer, who won an Emmy for his work
articles.content:
After 31 years the voice of the African-American doctor on The Simpsons will not be that of the white actor who also portrays white characters in the show.
